Header.title: We are SolSantaClaus
Header.paragraph: 888 SantaClaus at 0.5SOL/unit coming up the 23rd December 2021

Faq.paragraph: Why in SantaClaus you should trust:

Team.name: Nicolas Dehaeseleer (CEO)
Team.job: He is 25 and lives in Belgium. He works as an accountant and is pursuing a master in tax law to specialize in crypto taxation. In crypto since 2018, he is particularly interested in NFTs.

Team.name: Olivier Janmart (Designer)
Team.job: He is 28 years old and also lives in Belgium. He works as an electromechanical engineer and his passion is drawing. Not into the world of crypto and NFTs, he will mainly deal with design.

Team.name: Charles Boutault (Community manager)
Team.job: He is 29 years old and lives in France. He has been in crypto for 2 years. In the team, he is in charge of writing messages and making collaborations.

Team.name: SantaClaus (Gift deliver)
Team.job: He's the center of our project, he and his 888 friends are going to land in your wallet the 23rd December 2021

Features.title: Safety-PPH-zone
Features.text: The SafetyPPHzone will start at 50% of the mint price and will increase by 3% per day. This means that every day the team will sweep what is below this SafetyPPHzone, which guarantee that 17 days after the mint, the price cannot be lower than the mint price !

Features.title: Santa token
Features.text: $Santa will be the cryptocurrency of Santaclaus and will be the currency of exchange for the NFT store on our website.

Features.title: Showcase
Features.text: NFTs from different collections will be available on the showcase page of our website, (SDB, Turtles, Pesky penguins, etc). All the NFT you will see will have already been purchased and will be in the Santa community wallet. You will have the possibility to buy these NFTs only with $Santa cryptocurrency on our store.
